name: @schnick371/devsteps-cli
description: Never Code Alone. CLI for AI-assisted developer task tracking.
author: Thomas Hertel <thomas.hertel@devsteps.dev>

scripts.build: tsc && node esbuild.mjs && npm run copy:docs && npm run copy:copilot
scripts.copy:copilot: rm -rf .github && mkdir -p .github/prompts .github/instructions .github/agents && (cp ../../.github/prompts/devsteps-*.prompt.md .github/prompts/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: .github prompts not found') && (cp ../../.github/instructions/devsteps*.instructions.md .github/instructions/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: .github instructions not found') && (cp ../../.github/agents/devsteps*.agent.md .github/agents/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Warning: .github agents not found')
